name: Decimal_representation_50
latex: {\displaystyle {\begin{aligned}0.000{\overline {4567}}&=4567\times 0.000{\overline {0001}}\\&=4567\times 0.{\overline {0001}}\times {\frac {1}{10^{3}}}\\&=4567\times {\frac {1}{9999}}\times {\frac {1}{10^{3}}}\\&={\frac {4567}{9999}}\times {\frac {1}{10^{3}}}\\&={\frac {4567}{(10^{4}-1)\times 10^{3}}}&{\text{The exponents are the number of non-repeating digits after the decimal point (3) and the number of repeating digits (4).}}\end{aligned}}}

name: Decimal_representation_51
latex: {\displaystyle {\begin{aligned}\pm 8.123{\overline {4567}}&=\pm \left(8+{\frac {123}{10^{3}}}+{\frac {4567}{(10^{4}-1)\times 10^{3}}}\right)&{\text{from above}}\\&=\pm {\frac {8\times (10^{4}-1)\times 10^{3}+123\times (10^{4}-1)+4567}{(10^{4}-1)\times 10^{3}}}&{\text{common denominator}}\\&=\pm {\frac {81226444}{9999000}}&{\text{multiplying, and summing the numerator}}\\&=\pm {\frac {20306611}{2499750}}&{\text{reducing}}\\\end{aligned}}}
